attributes.action: Investigate and publish the reason of our failing capability to deliver HMS Astute on time and within budget
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An immediate enquiry is required to ascertain and understand our technology shortcomings in being able to adequately resource the HMS Astute Program, the cost to the tax payer and the need to bring in US boat builder Electric Boat to assure completion!
